Abyss:ThoughtStealer.NAME: Thought Stealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains a charge for every card drawn past your first #b{0} each turn. At #b{1} charges, ALL enemies gain #b{2} #yStrength.

Abyss:Berserker.NAME: Berserker
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, this enemy gains #b{0} #yStrength if it is the only enemy left at the end of the round.

Abyss:Resummon.NAME: Resummon
DESCRIPTIONS: #pVoid #pHerald will resummon #pVoid #pSpawn one turn after it dies, with the same amount of positive #yStrength as #pVoid #pHerald.

Abyss:DurableMinion.NAME: Durable Minion
DESCRIPTIONS: This minion will not abandon combat when its leader is defeated.

Abyss:Abysstouched.NAME: Abysstouched
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b{0}% more damage from #yAttacks. At the end of your turn, take #b{0} damage.
Receive #b{0}% more damage from #yAttacks. At the start of its turn, takes #b{0} damage.

Abyss:DelayedAbysstouched.NAME: Abysstouched
DESCRIPTIONS: Take #b{0}% more damage from #yAttacks. At the end of your turn, take #b{0} damage.

Abyss:Evolving.NAME: Evolving
DESCRIPTIONS: Evolves at the end of each turn.

Abyss:FrailPulse.NAME: Frail Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, apply #b{0} #yFrail.

Abyss:DazedPulse.NAME: Dazed Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, shuffle #b{0} #yDazed into your deck.

Abyss:AbysstouchedPulse.NAME: Abysstouched Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each round, apply #b{0} #yAbysstouched.

Abyss:SlimyBody.NAME: Slimy Body
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy takes attack damage, add a #ySlimed to your discard pile.

Abyss:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gains #b1 Strength for every #b{0} HP you have.

Abyss:Wary.NAME: Wary
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gains #b{0} Strength.

Abyss:PrimevalCall.NAME: Primeval Call
DESCRIPTIONS: Summons a #pRoyal #pProtector each turn.

Abyss:HandOfTheAbyss.NAME: Hand of the Abyss
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b{0} #yAbysstouched.

Abyss:BrokenCrystalSeal.NAME: Broken Crystal Seal
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b2 #yBroken #yCrystals to your deck each turn. NL Fragments of the crystal once used to seal this enemy litter the ground. Use them to weaken its regeneration!

Abyss:GoldenCrystal.NAME: Golden Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a rare card, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:BlueCrystal.NAME: Blue Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an uncommon card, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:GreenCrystal.NAME: Green Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that costs #b2 or more, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:RedCrystal.NAME: Red Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card that isn''t a #yStatus, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:PurpleCrystal.NAME: Purple Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain energy during your turn, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:GrayCrystal.NAME: Gray Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yStrength, #yDexterity, or #yFocus, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

Abyss:CrystalLink.NAME: Crystal Link
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a crystal dies, this enemy gains #b{0}% of the positive #yStrength it had after its next turn.

Abyss:InactiveCrystal.NAME: Inactive Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy is #gInactive. It is invulnerable and will not attack. NL Activates when #b{0} or fewer other crystals are left.

Abyss:EssenceThief.NAME: Essence Thief
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy will start #rpermanently #rreducing #ryour #rMax #rHP if left alive. Kill it quickly!

Abyss:Resonance.NAME: Resonance
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b{0}% less damage from attacks. #yResonance is reapplied every other turn.

Abyss:ChainsOfDoom.NAME: Chains of Doom
DESCRIPTIONS: While this enemy is alive, you cannot escape from combat.

Abyss:Emptiness.NAME: Emptiness
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this enemy''s turn, gains #b{0} #yArtifact if it attacked and dealt #b{1} or less unblocked attack damage.

Abyss:ReducedHealing.NAME: Reduced Healing
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Healing is #b{0}% less effective.

Abyss:StrengthDegeneration.NAME: Strength Degeneration
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. At the start of each turn, lose {0}% of any positive #yStrength.

Abyss:FlimsyDaggers.NAME: Flimsy Daggers
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Attacks that cost #b0 deal #b{0}% less damage.

Abyss:FeeblePoison.NAME: Feeble Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Reduce #yPoison applied by #b{0}% (but not below #b1).

Abyss:WeakOrbs.NAME: Weak Orbs
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Dark and Lightning orbs deal #b{0}% less damage.

Abyss:OrbDecay.NAME: Orb Decay
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. At the start of every third turn, if you have more than one orb slot, lose an orb slot.

Abyss:DisturbedCalm.NAME: Disturbed Calm
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Whenever you exit Calm or enter Divinity, gain one less [E] .

Abyss:SubduedSpirit.NAME: Subdued Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Deal a third less attack damage in Wrath and Divinity.

Abyss:VoidEmbrace.NAME: Void Embrace
DESCRIPTIONS: #pUncleansable. Each odd turn, draw one less card. Each even turn, lose [E] .
